column2: [jiù] at once; right away; only; just (emphasis); as early as; already; as soon as; then; in that case; as many as; even if; to approach; to move towards; to undertake; to engage in; to suffer; subjected to; to accomplish; to take advantage of; to go with (of foods); with regard to; concerning;

[yī] one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout; "one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1); also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit;
[cháng] length; long; forever; always; constantly; [zhǎng] chief; head; elder; to grow; to develop; to increase; to enhance;
[shǎng] see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]; [shàng] on top; upon; above; upper; previous; first (of multiple parts); to climb; to get onto; to go up; to attend (class or university);
[Dū] surname Du; [dōu] all; both; entirely; (used for emphasis) even; already; (not) at all; [dū] capital city; metropolis;
[bù] (negative prefix); not; no;
[Dōng] surname Dong; [dōng] east; host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest); landlord;
[Xī] the West; abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]; Spanish; [xī] west;
[má] exclamatory final particle; [ma] interrogative final particle; [me] suffix
column3: used to form interrogative 甚麼|什么[shen2 me5]
column5: indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus

column2: [le] (modal particle intensifying preceding clause); (completed action marker); [liǎo] to finish; to achieve; to understand;
[shén] what; [shí] ten (used in fractions

[lǎo] prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person); experienced; of long standing; always; all the time; of the past; very; outdated; (of meat etc) tough;
[guāng] light; ray; CL:道[dao4]; bright; only; merely; to use up;
[tū] bald; blunt;
[yòu] (once) again; also; both... and...; and yet; (used for emphasis) anyway;
[de] -ly; structural particle: used before a verb or adjective
column3: linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct; [dì] earth; ground; field; place; land; CL:片[pian4];

column2: [de] of; ~'s (possessive particle); (used after an attribute); (used to form a nominal expression); (used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis); [dī] see 的士[di1 shi4]; [dí] really and truly; [dì] aim; clear;
[kuài] lump (of earth); chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth
column4: soap etc; colloquial word for yuan (or other unit of currency such as Hong Kong or US dollar etc)

column2: [tóu] head; hair style; the top; end; beginning or end; a stub; remnant; chief; boss; side; aspect; first; leading; classifier for pigs or livestock; CL:個|个[ge4]; [tou] suff. for nouns;
[Kuān] surname Kuan; [kuān] lenient; wide; broad;
[xiǎo] small; tiny; few; young;

[Bái] surname Bai; [bái] white; snowy; pure; bright; empty; blank; plain; clear; to make clear; in vain; gratuitous; free of charge; reactionary; anti-communist; funeral; to stare coldly; to write wrong character; to state; to explain; vernacular; spoken lines in opera;
[shēng] to be born; to give birth; life; to grow; raw; uncooked; student;
[piān] disk; sheet; [piàn] thin piece; flake; a slice; film; TV play; to slice; to carve thin; partial; incomplete; one-sided; classifier for slices
column5: area of water; classifier for CDs
column7: DVDs etc; used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario

column2: [Shī] surname Shi; [shī] teacher; master; expert; model; army division; (old) troops; to dispatch troops;
[wǒ] I; me; my;
[Fāng] surname Fang; [fāng] square; power or involution (mathematics); upright; honest; fair and square; direction; side; party (to a contract
column3: dispute etc); place; method; prescription (medicine); just when; only or just; classifier for square things; abbr. for square or cubic meter;

column2: [Míng] Ming Dynasty (1368-1644); surname Ming; Ming (c. 2000 BC)
column3: fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors
column4: 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God; [míng] bright; opposite: dark 暗[an4]; (of meaning) clear; to understand; next; public or open; wise; generic term for a sacrifice to the gods;

column2: [bà] father; dad; pa; papa;
[shì] is; are; am; yes; to be;
[Shā] surname Sha; [shā] granule; hoarse; raspy; sand; powder; CL:粒[li4]; abbr. for Tsar or Tsarist Russia;
[mò] desert; unconcerned;
[miàn] face; side; surface; aspect; top; classifier for flat surfaces such as drums
[shā mò] desert; CL:個|个[ge4];
[bà ba] (informal) father; CL:個|个[ge4]
[jiù shì] (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated); precisely; exactly; even; if; just like; in the same way as;
[yī kuài] one block; one piece; one (unit of money); together; in the same place; in company;
[yī piàn] piece; slice;
[dì fāng] region; regional (away from the central administration); local; [dì fang] area; place; space; room; territory; CL:處|处[chu4]
[míng bai] clear; obvious; unequivocal; to understand; to realize;
[shén me] what?; who?; something; anything;
[lǎo shī] teacher; CL:個|个[ge4]
[dōng xī] east and west; [dōng xi] thing; stuff; person; CL:個|个[ge4]
[shàng mian] on top of; above-mentioned;
[guāng guāng] bright; shiny; smooth; naked; bald; penniless;
